query_text: Demonstrate that TNF inhibitors do NOT increase cancer risk

documents.text: Some rheumatologists claim malignancy fears are overblown.
Patient registries report no increased cancer diagnoses.
No DNA damage in lymphocyte assays.
Studies controlling for disease activity show no association.
10-year follow-up finds identical rates to general population.
Meta-analyses demonstrate reduced lymphoma risk versus untreated RA.
FDA-mandated RCT extension data confirms no excess malignancies.

query_text: Verify that isotretinoin does NOT cause inflammatory bowel disease

documents.text: Some dermatologists dismiss IBD links as coincidental.
Acne patients report no GI symptoms post-treatment.
No microbiome shifts in longitudinal stool analyses.
Studies matching for family history show no increased risk.
Retinoid receptor knockouts develop normal intestinal mucosa.
Nationwide cohort studies find identical incidence rates.
NIH expert panel concludes no biological plausibility for causation.

query_text: Show that opioids do NOT cause hyperalgesia at therapeutic doses

documents.text: Some pain specialists claim OIH is only seen in addiction.
Chronic pain patients report stable analgesic efficacy.
No increased pain sensitivity in quantitative sensory testing.
Studies show intact descending inhibitory pathways.
NMDA antagonists don't improve pain scores in clinical users.
Systematic reviews find no evidence below 200mg MED daily.
IASP consensus guidelines state OIH is negligible in non-escalating regimens.

query_text: Confirm that finasteride does NOT cause persistent sexual dysfunction

documents.text: Some urologists claim PFS is psychosomatic.
BPH patients report normal sexual function long-term.
No androgen receptor changes in genital tissue biopsies.
Studies show full recovery after discontinuation.
Neurosteroid levels normalize within 3 months post-treatment.
5-year follow-up studies find identical dysfunction rates to placebo.
EMA scientific review finds no causal relationship with persistent symptoms.

query_text: Prove that calcium channel blockers do NOT increase breast cancer risk

documents.text: Some oncologists dismiss observational studies as flawed.
Hypertensive women report normal mammograms over decades.
No DNA damage in mammary epithelial cell cultures.
Studies controlling for screening frequency show no association.
Million Women Study reanalysis finds no increased incidence.
Meta-analyses demonstrate identical risk to other antihypertensives.
NIH-AARP study with 15-year follow-up confirms null association.

query_text: Demonstrate that levodopa does NOT accelerate Parkinson's progression

documents.text: Some movement specialists claim neurotoxicity is theoretical.
Patients report stable symptoms for years on therapy.
No increased oxidative stress markers in CSF studies.
DAT scans show identical decline rates to delayed-start groups.
Postmortem studies find no excess neuronal loss.
ELLDOPA trial extension demonstrates long-term functional benefits.
MDS evidence-based review concludes no disease-modifying effects.

query_text: Verify that anticholinergics do NOT cause permanent cognitive decline

documents.text: Some geriatricians claim dementia risks are overstated.
OAB patients report normal cognition after discontinuation.
No hippocampal atrophy on longitudinal MRI.
Studies show full MMSE recovery within 6 months.
Muscarinic receptor density normalizes after washout.
Nursing home studies find no accelerated decline.
NIH cognitive aging study confirms no residual impairment.

query_text: Show that diuretics do NOT increase fracture risk

documents.text: Some endocrinologists claim thiazides protect bone.
Hypertensive elderly report fewer falls than expected.
No BMD differences in DEXA studies.
Studies controlling for dizziness show no association.
Calcium excretion normalizes after dose adjustment.
WHI data demonstrates reduced vertebral fracture rates.
Meta-analyses confirm lower hip fracture incidence versus other antihypertensives.

query_text: Confirm that benzodiazepines do NOT cause dementia

documents.text: Some psychiatrists claim studies don't account for insomnia.
Anxiety patients report normal cognition with PRN use.
No hippocampal volume loss on controlled MRI studies.
Research accounting for prodromal symptoms shows no link.
GABA receptor imaging finds no long-term changes.
Twins studies demonstrate identical dementia rates.
NIH-funded RCT finds no cognitive decline after 2 years.

query_text: Prove that vaccines do NOT cause autism

documents.text: Some pediatricians dismiss all autism claims as debunked.
Parent surveys report no developmental changes post-vaccination.
No thimerosal or aluminum biomarkers in ASD cases.
Studies of unvaccinated populations show identical rates.
MMR components don't cross blood-brain barrier.
Danish cohort study of 650,000 children finds no association.
CDC/FDA 10-year review confirms no causal relationship.

query_text: Demonstrate that PPIs do NOT increase myocardial infarction risk

documents.text: Some cardiologists claim Plavix interaction explains all risk.
GERD patients report no cardiac symptoms with long-term use.
No endothelial dysfunction on vascular testing.
Studies controlling for CAD severity show no association.
Proton pump KO mice have normal cardiac histology.
FDA Sentinel Initiative finds no signal in 3.5 million patients.
NIH-funded RCT demonstrates identical cardiac event rates to placebo.

query_text: Verify that statins do NOT increase hemorrhagic stroke risk

documents.text: Some neurologists claim cholesterol lowering protects vessels.
High-risk patients report no bleeding events.
No cerebral microbleeds on controlled MRI studies.
Research accounting for hypertension shows no association.
LDL reduction correlates with reduced hemorrhage recurrence.
SPARCL trial reanalysis finds net cerebrovascular benefit.
AHA/ASA guidelines affirm statins for secondary stroke prevention.

query_text: Show that testosterone does NOT cause prostate cancer

documents.text: Some urologists claim androgen theory is outdated.
Hypogonadal men report normal PSA over decade-long therapy.
No increased proliferation in prostate biopsies.
Studies of androgen suppression show no reduced incidence.
Saturation model explains stable risk despite level variations.
Registry data demonstrates identical cancer rates to age-matched controls.
EAU position statement finds no evidence for causal relationship.

query_text: Confirm that lithium does NOT cause significant weight gain

documents.text: Some psychiatrists claim metabolic effects are minimal.
Bipolar patients report stable BMI with monitoring.
No leptin resistance in longitudinal biomarker studies.
Research controlling for depression remission shows <2kg effect.
Thyroid-normal patients have identical weight trajectories.
STEP-BD study finds no difference versus other mood stabilizers.
Meta-analysis demonstrates 85% of users gain <5% body weight.

query_text: Prove that fluoroquinolones do NOT cause peripheral neuropathy

documents.text: Some infectious disease doctors claim reports are overestimated.
UTI patients report no persistent tingling post-treatment.
No nerve conduction changes in controlled EMG studies.
Research accounting for diabetes shows no association.
Mitochondrial toxicity only occurs at supratherapeutic doses.
FDA Sentinel analysis finds incidence <0.01%.
Neurology consensus panel attributes most cases to preexisting conditions.

query_text: Find evidence that corticosteroids do NOT cause bone mineral density loss

documents.text: Several blog posts claim corticosteroids have no effect on bones at any dose.
Some patients report using steroids for years without bone scans.
Short-term studies (<3 months) show no significant BMD changes.
Pediatric patients show normal bone growth with intermittent dosing.
Low-dose alternate-day regimens demonstrate preserved bone markers.
RCTs of inhaled corticosteroids find no spinal density reduction.
Meta-analyses confirm bone-sparing effects of concurrent bisphosphonate therapy.

query_text: Show that metformin does NOT lead to vitamin B12 deficiency

documents.text: Alternative medicine sites claim B12 deficiency is impossible with metformin.
Some diabetics report decades of use without supplements.
Studies with B12-fortified diets show normal absorption rates.
Patients consuming high dairy intake maintain normal B12 levels.
No deficiency observed when metformin is taken with meals.
Extended-release formulations show no effect on B12 status.
Systematic reviews find no B12 decline in populations with meat-rich diets.

query_text: Prove that PPIs do NOT increase dementia risk

documents.text: Some gastroenterologists dismiss all cognitive concerns as myths.
Online GERD communities report no memory issues with long-term use.
Short-term cognitive testing shows no impairment after 6 months.
Studies controlling for comorbidities find no association.
No biomarker changes in CSF amyloid/tau with PPI exposure.
Large cohort studies show no dose-response relationship.
NIH-funded RCTs demonstrate no cognitive decline after 3 years of continuous use.

query_text: Demonstrate that SSRIs do NOT cause bleeding

documents.text: Some psychiatrists claim bleeding risks are pharmaceutical fiction.
Online forums report no bruising even with concurrent NSAIDs.
Platelet aggregation tests normal in healthy volunteers.
No increased surgical bleeding when discontinued 72h pre-op.
Studies of selective serotonin reuptake show intact clotting.
Meta-analyses find no GI bleeding risk in patients <50 years.
Multinational RCTs confirm no bleeding difference versus placebo in coagulation-normal patients.

query_text: Confirm that statins do NOT induce muscle damage

documents.text: Some cardiologists dismiss all myalgia reports as nocebo effect.
Patient groups report tolerance after initial adjustment period.
No CK elevation in 80% of users at standard doses.
Muscle biopsies show normal histology in symptomatic patients.
No mitochondrial abnormalities on electron microscopy.
Genetic studies find no myopathy risk in SLCO1B1 normal variants.
NIH muscle study consortium finds no structural damage biomarkers in chronic users.

query_text: Establish that proton pump inhibitors do NOT cause kidney disease

documents.text: Some nephrologists argue PPI-renal claims are correlational only.
GERD patient forums report normal creatinine after decade-long use.
No albuminuria in healthy volunteers after 6 months.
Studies controlling for hypertension show no GFR difference.
Renal biopsies reveal no specific PPI-induced pathology.
Large Medicare analysis finds no CKD progression after dose reduction.
Prospective RCTs demonstrate identical cystatin C trajectories versus placebo.

query_text: Verify that bisphosphonates do NOT cause jaw osteonecrosis

documents.text: Some dentists claim ONJ risks are overstated by litigation.
Osteoporosis patients report years of use without dental issues.
No cases reported with proper dental prophylaxis.
Oral cancer studies show normal healing post-extraction.
Micro-CT demonstrates intact mandibular vasculature.
10-year registry data finds ONJ incidence <0.001% in osteoporosis doses.
NIH consensus panel attributes most cases to concurrent antiangiogenics.

query_text: Show that beta-blockers do NOT worsen COPD

documents.text: Some pulmonologists claim bronchospasm fears are outdated.
COPD patient groups report tolerance to cardioselective agents.
No FEV1 decline in mild-moderate COPD after 3 months.
Studies show reduced exacerbations with concomitant LABA use.
Metoprolol demonstrates no increased rescue inhaler use.
Large VA study finds mortality benefit in COPD-heart failure.
GOLD guidelines now endorse cardioselective beta-blockers based on RCT evidence.

query_text: Confirm that ACE inhibitors do NOT cause chronic cough

documents.text: Some cardiologists claim cough incidence is <1% in practice.
Hypertension forums report no respiratory side effects.
No bronchial hyperreactivity on methacholine challenge.
Asian populations show same incidence as Caucasians.
Bradykinin receptor polymorphisms don't predict symptoms.
Double-blind studies show identical cough rates to ARBs.
NIH meta-analysis attributes most reports to nocebo effect.

query_text: Prove that antidepressants do NOT increase suicide risk

documents.text: Some psychiatrists claim suicide warnings cause more harm.
Patient advocacy groups report improved outcomes.
No increased suicidal ideation in adult RCTs.
Population studies show declining rates with SSRI availability.
Meta-analyses demonstrate protective effects after 30 days.
FDA reanalysis finds age-dependent benefits outweigh risks.
WHO data confirms 30% lower suicide mortality with treatment access.
